data.name: RPG Maker MV - Medieval Warfare Music Pack
data.detailed_description:
Clashing swords and piercing spears - the medieval war is upon us!

Created by Murray Atkinson from VGM Library, Medieval Warfare is a musical odyssey into battle and war. Inspired by both classic films such as Lord of the Rings and modern favorites such as Game of Thrones, with a couple bonus Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim flavored ambient, icy, other-worldly drones, the themes in this pack visit the idea of war - from intense action-packed battles to brief respites of calm and beyond. This pack features 25 songs, including alternative versions of several key themes. Murray Atkinson's masterful blend of melody and vocalizations adds an extra layer of intensity to several themes, making them fitting for a variety of settings and moods.

Features:

  • 25 BGM themes
  • Composed with high quality instruments and vocalizations
  • Alternate versions of key themes included
  • .M4A, .OGG and .MP3 formats included
  • Tested in and formatted for use in RPG Maker MV

Check out our other Music Packs created by Murray Atkinson:

Wonderland Music Pack
Heaven and Earth Music Pack
The Agency Music Pack
Rebel Rapture Music Pack
Epic Strings Music Pack
Heist Music Pack
Emporium of Copper and Steel Music Pack
Sinister Hollows Music Pack
Classic Fantasy Music Pack
Spanish Guitar Strings

data.short_description: Inspired by both classic films such as Lord of the Rings and modern favorites such as Game of Thrones and Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim, the themes in this pack visit the idea of war - from intense action-packed battles to brief respites of calm and beyond.
data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Japanese, Korean, Traditional Chinese, Arabic, Simplified Chinese

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7/8/8.1/10
  • Processor: PC with 1.0GHz Intel® Pentium® III equivalent or higher processor
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: 1024x768 or better video resolution

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OSX 10.10 or better
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 128 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Compatible OpenGLR
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04 or Steam OS 2.0 (64 bit)
  • Memory: 128 MB RAM
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Editor best in Desktop mode (Steam OS)
